task.title: How to improve your slide
task.shortdesc: Short step-by-step guidance on how to improve your skate cross-country skiing technique.

taskbody.context: This procedure can help you improve your skate technique, if you already try to perform it well (no Å¡upiny or tourists welcome here), but you still feel you don't gain as much as you could from it.

step.cmd: Imitate spider moves over the track.
Try to stay and slide as long as you can on each ski before every push (well, this is an actual advice...).
Use your ski poles to add as much force as you can for every push of your ski.
